title: The Cards
description: Philip pulled his car to the curb, turned off the engine, and then sat for a long minute…Was he really going to do this? What were the odds that a little stack of cards could give him the answers and the hope he craved?Philip’s world spins out of control as questions loom about his future. As past hurts resurface and his emotions reach the breaking point, he discovers Madame Theo and the promises she claims in the cards. Do the cards offer hope…or destruction?Join Philip, Becka, Scott, and their friends at Crescent Bay High in this final heart-stopping thriller.
author: Bill Myers
